page.title: 09Aberford Gala-July 1985
page.content: This years{gala}was held on Saturday 13th July.The float procession up the village and back started at 1.30.This year there were three floats,the horse and trap in which was the queen and her attendants and the majorettes.The floats were by Aberford school with their Pirate Ship,the church with Sport For All and Playschool with Feed The World.The gala was opened by Teddy Turner(Chalkie from Coronation Street) at{2.00.The gala queen(Joanna Oddy-11) was crowned by the retiring queen Emma Armstrong with the help of attendants Charlotte Turner,Sarah Noble,Claire Hind,Paula Fletcher and Sara Baxter.There were many stalls,tombola, bouncy castle,coconut shy etc.There wasalso a gala week 5 a side football competition and the whole gala made approximately Â£450 for village hall funds.
